column4: Tesla seeks to dismiss securities fraud lawsuit: U.S. court document
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Inc on Friday asked a court to dismiss a securities fraud lawsuit by shareholders who said the electric vehicle maker gave false public statements about the progress of producing its new Model 3 sedan.

column4: Tesla seeks to dismiss securities fraud lawsuit -U.S. court document
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  May 25 Tesla Inc on Friday asked a court to dismiss a securities fraud lawsuit by shareholders who said the electric vehicle maker gave false public statements about the progress of producing its new Model 3 sedan.

column4: Motor racing: F1 governing body clears Ferrari of suspicion
column5: MONACO Formula One's governing body has cleared Ferrari of any suspicion of cheating after rivals questioned the Formula One team's energy recovery system.

column4: Motor racing-F1 governing body clears Ferrari of suspicion
column5: MONACO  May 26 Formula One's governing body has cleared Ferrari of any suspicion of cheating after rivals questioned the Formula One team's energy recovery system.
